alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 12 at 9:11PM AKST until December 13 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST MONDAY FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeasterly winds of 35 to 50 mph will continue through Monday morning before diminishing around noon. The combination of strong winds and temperatures falling to between 10 and 15 below zero will allow wind chill values to drop to between 40 and 50 below zero through Thompson Pass.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
